subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Todd Bowles, the Jets’ first-year head coach, handled Sunday’s 24-17 loss to Philadelphia in the same manner he handled an earlier victory: low-key, reminding fans that the season is a marathon.
snippet: Todd Bowles, the Jets’ first-year head coach, handled Sunday’s 24-17 loss to Philadelphia in the same manner he handled an earlier victory: low-key, reminding fans that the season is a marathon.
